title: Answer a COBRA Question
description: A recently terminated employee calls to ask how they can continue their health insurance coverage under COBRA.

tasks.description: Identify the former employee in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the terminated employee's record.

tasks.description: Explain that they will receive a COBRA election packet from the third-party benefits administrator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the process and timeline.

tasks.description: Provide the contact information for the third-party administrator for any further questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the former employee the correct contact information.
